00021    using namespace Util;

00031    template <class SystemType>
00032    class PressureAverage : public SystemDiagnostic<SystemType>
00033    {
00034    
00035    public:
00036 
00040       PressureAverage(SystemType& system);
00041 
00045       virtual void readParam(std::istream& in);
00046 
00050       virtual void setup();
00051    
00052       /* 
00053       * Evaluate energy per particle, and add to ensemble. 
00054       */
00055       virtual void sample(long iStep);
00056    
00060       virtual void output();
00061 
00067       virtual void save(Serializable::OArchiveType& ar);
00068 
00074       virtual void load(Serializable::IArchiveType& ar);
00075 
00082       template <class Archive>
00083       void serialize(Archive& ar, const unsigned int version);
00084 
00085    private:
00086 
00088       std::ofstream outputFile_;
00089 
00091       Average  accumulator_;
00092 
00094       int nSamplePerBlock_;
00095 
00097       bool    isInitialized_;
00098 
00099       using SystemDiagnostic<SystemType>::readInterval;
00100       using SystemDiagnostic<SystemType>::readOutputFileName;
00101       using SystemDiagnostic<SystemType>::writeParam;
00102       using SystemDiagnostic<SystemType>::isAtInterval;
00103       using SystemDiagnostic<SystemType>::outputFileName;
00104       using SystemDiagnostic<SystemType>::fileMaster;
00105       using SystemDiagnostic<SystemType>::system;
00106 
00107    };

00109    /*
00110    * Constructor.
00111    */
00112    template <class SystemType>
00113    PressureAverage<SystemType>::PressureAverage(SystemType& system)
00114     : SystemDiagnostic<SystemType>(system),
00115       outputFile_(),
00116       accumulator_(),
00117       nSamplePerBlock_(-1),
00118       isInitialized_(false)
00119    {}
00120 
00121    /*
00122    * Read parameters and initialize.
00123    */
00124    template <class SystemType>
00125    void PressureAverage<SystemType>::readParam(std::istream& in)
00126    {
00127 
00128       readInterval(in);
00129       readOutputFileName(in);
00130       SystemDiagnostic<SystemType>::read(in,"nSamplePerBlock", nSamplePerBlock_);
00131 
00132       accumulator_.setNSamplePerBlock(nSamplePerBlock_);
00133 
00134       // If nSamplePerBlock != 0, open an output file for block averages.
00135       if (accumulator_.nSamplePerBlock()) {
00136          fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00137       }
00138 
00139       isInitialized_ = true;
00140    }
00141 
00142    /*
00143    * Set up immediately before simulation.
00144    */
00145    template <class SystemType>
00146    void PressureAverage<SystemType>::setup() 
00147    {
00148       if (!isInitialized_) {
00149          UTIL_THROW("Object not initialized");
00150       }  
00151       accumulator_.clear(); 
00152    }
00153  
00154    /* 
00155    * Evaluate pressure, and add to accumulator.
00156    */
00157    template <class SystemType>
00158    void PressureAverage<SystemType>::sample(long iStep) 
00159    {
00160       double pressure;
00161       SystemType* systemPtr_ = &system();
00162       systemPtr_->computeStress(pressure);
00163       if (isAtInterval(iStep)) {
00164          accumulator_.sample(pressure, outputFile_);
00165       }
00166    }
00167 
00168    /*
00169    * Output results to file after simulation is completed.
00170    */
00171    template <class SystemType>
00172    void PressureAverage<SystemType>::output() 
00173    {
00174       // If outputFile_ was used to write block averages, close it.
00175       if (accumulator_.nSamplePerBlock()) {
00176          outputFile_.close();
00177       }
00178 
00179       // Write parameters to *.prm file
00180       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".prm"), outputFile_);
00181       writeParam(outputFile_); 
00182       outputFile_.close();
00183 
00184       // Write average and variance to *.ave file
00185       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".ave"), outputFile_);
00186       accumulator_.output(outputFile_); 
00187       outputFile_.close();
00188 
00189    }
00190 
00191    /*
00192    * Save state to binary file archive.
00193    */
00194    template <class SystemType>
00195    void PressureAverage<SystemType>::save(Serializable::OArchiveType& ar)
00196    { ar & *this; }
00197 
00198    /*
00199    * Load state from a binary file archive.
00200    */
00201    template <class SystemType>
00202    void PressureAverage<SystemType>::load(Serializable::IArchiveType& ar)
00203    { ar & *this; }
00204 
00205    /*
00206    * Serialize to/from an archive. 
00207    */
00208    template <class SystemType>
00209    template <class Archive>
00210    void PressureAverage<SystemType>::serialize(Archive& ar, const unsigned int version)
00211    {
00212       if (!isInitialized_) {
00213          UTIL_THROW("Error: Object not initialized.");
00214       }
00215       ar & accumulator_;
00216    }
